personGroupDescription.description: Name of the group of persons

payrollFemale.description: Daily sickness benefits salary total for women

payrollMale.description: Daily sickness benefits salary total for men

payrollTotal.description: Total daily sickness benefits salary for men and women

averageAgePersonGroup.description: Average age of the persongroup, only needed if the total amount of persons in the persongroup is less then or equal to 4

uniformPremiumRate.description: Unit premium rate i.e. should a distinction be made between men and women in the premium rate.

premiumPersonGroup.description: Premium of the insured group of persons. Must be set for offer and omitted during request.

netPremiumDSBPersonGroupMalePercentage.description: Net premium rate for daily sickness benefits for men in the group of persons. The net premium rate corresponds to the percentage of the net premium offered after deducting any discounts (combination discounts, payroll discounts, etc.), but without surcharges for fixed premium components. The net premium includes any final fee, brokerage fee, taxes and duties. Corresponds to the premium charged to the customer.
